amendment.description: To increase the total number of Department of Homeland Security additional detention bed spaces by 1,700 beds in fiscal year 2007.

vote.text: Amendment SA 4670 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 4670 proposed by Senator Gregg for Senator Kyl. (consideration: CR S7496-7497; text: CR S7496) To increase the total number of Department of Homeland Security additional detention bed spaces by 1,700 beds in fiscal year 2007.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 4670 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 4670 proposed by Senator Gregg for Senator Kyl.
